Recap Serum for Better Scalp Health | Contains Redensyl, Procapil, & Capixyl (30 ml)
Traya Defence Conditioner with Biotin & Niacinamide | Mild Formula, Safe for daily use | 100g
products.body_html:
About Traya Defence Conditioner

Traya Defence Conditioner, mild formulation for dry and frizzy hair. Scalp friendly and completely safe for everyday use.

Benefits of Traya Defence Conditioner

Traya Defence conditioner works to improve hair quality by deeply moisturizing the hair strands. It helps to support hair growth and controls hair fall by reducing the oxidative stress of the hair cells with clinically proven ingredients. It is a mild conditioner that is scalp-friendly and safe for everyday use.

Directions to use

Apply the conditioner after using the shampoo. Apply along the lengths of your hair, leave it for 3-5 minutes and rinse thoroughly.

For best results, use along with Traya Defence shampoo

Dosage
Use it twice a week or every time after shampoo. It is also safe for daily use.

products.title: Defence shampoo | Mild Shampoo with Biotin (180 ml)
products.body_html:
About Traya Hair Fall shampoo

Say goodbye to bad hair days with Traya Hair Fall Shampoo! Formulated with Biotin, Niacinamide, and Pea Sprout. This combination stimulates hair follicles, restores root health, and nourishes the scalp. It also helps promote hair growth by providing essential nutrients to the scalp and hair. It will be helpful in protecting hair against further damage nutrients and antioxidants to refresh and revitalize hair from the root and protect it from further damage.

Benefits

  • Revitalizes hair from the root
  • Shortens the telogen phase
  • Moisturises hair and refreshes the scalp
  • Improves hair strength, shine, and thickness

      How to use

      Take a small quantity of Traya Hairfall shampoo and apply it to your wet hair and scalp. Rinse immediately. Use the shampoo twice a week or as per the curated by the doctor.

      How to use the Traya Hair Fall Shampoo?
      On a damp scalp apply enough shampoo to produce lather and rinse it thoroughly with water.

      Dosage
      Twice a week or as recommended by Traya doctors.

products.title: Scalp Oil 100ml with Essential Oils for Hair Growth with Bhringraj
products.body_html:
About Traya Herbal Hair Oil

An effective combination of essential oils like Motia rosha, Ylang-Ylang and Camphor mixed with Goats Milk. This customized Ayurvedic concoction that soothes your scalp, improves scalp health and pacifies pitta (scalp heat).

Benefits of Herbal Oil

  • Targets stress as a root cause of hair loss by having a soothing and relaxing effect
  • Improves hair thickness
  • Pacifies heat caused by excess pitta to hair roots
  • Reduces scalp inflammation which weakens roots
  • Improves scalp health and keeps dandruff at bay

    How to Use
    Apply gently with fingers on your scalp before shampoo.

    Dosage
    Twice a week or as prescribed by the doctor.
